channel.title: Topic Layout(s) - Deleted ALL layouts and made new one! More to come!
channel.description:
With the permission of Taharok I am posting a Pre-Fomated Layout. This is to help everyone who wishes to make their topic look amazing for viewers to apply. If you wish this, feel free to use this layout!
NOTE:
[quote="Skyru"]The formatting thread is just a way to help people out while creating a development team thread.[/quote]
---
[size=36pt][b]Layout 1[/b][/size]
---
[center]Logo[/center]
[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u]
Write an introduction to your topic about your server. Here's a great intro: [quote="Clawz fury"]Well I was supposed to release a clean delta a numerous amount of times but something always got in the way whether it was school or something with the project or whatever.
I think I'm doing this more for me than for the people using this, mainly because I feel I should have done and released something like this so long ago.
By now most of you are probably thinking - "Here we go again, another one of his delta cleaning projects that he won't finish". To be honest, I'm pretty confident I'll finish it (mainly because of the great progress I already made), but I'm not promising anything.[/quote]
[u][b]Why this project started...[/b][/u] Why did you decide to make you project? To learn new things or to make a RSPS to show your skills. Whatever the reason, show it here. Here's an example: [quote="Mikey Sasse"]Aganoth is a server I've been working on since mid July of 2012. My goal for this server is an economy server with a large player base, a great community, and flawless game-play. I am the only server developer, and the server is joint-owned by myself and my partner Drake.[/quote] You can call this an intro, but I call this an about.
[code=Update Log] Post your updates here. I suggest making your update log have a layout. [/code] Example: [code=Update Log] Name(s) - Date - Description Arham - 10/18/12 - Started project. etc.. etc.. etc.. [/code] [b]NOW THIS PART IS OPTIONAL![/b] [code=Bugs List] Post your bugs that you or another teammate has/have found. [/code] Example: [code=Bugs List] Date - Name(s) - How disastrous (Huge, Medium, Easy) - Description - Fixed? - (Optional) Comments 10/20/2012 - Kodiak & Arham - Huge - Only one player can log in at a time - Fixed For two people ^^ 10/21/2012 - Arham - Easy - Npcs can't walk - Fixed For one person^^ etc... etc.. etc. [/code]
Put some media here. Pictures first, then videos.
[hr]
Final words
[hr] [code=Application Format] This is the Application Format. Try to get as much data as you need from them. But don't ask for too much. [/code] Example: [code=Application Format] Msn/Skype: Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...): How many hours a day can you work?: Why should I consider you: Anything else?: [/code] --- Code: http://pastebin.com/MsXsvtvq --- I hope your servers get successful and I don't want any credits for this layout, I just purely want to help all of you fellow Moparscapians.
[size=36pt] More Layouts to come! [/size]
[size=18pt]Support this thread![/size]
People have not been using this thread. Please, put this in your signature: [code] If you're thinking about creating a development team, please read [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528465.0.html][i]this[/i][/url] before you create a thread. [/code]

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

artem543:

My layout will always be the best.

in rune-server. Your layouts only look beast in rune-server :P.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:33, topic:425802”]This is a good idea.

Should be a page list of links to different formats or just this one. Their shouldn’t be more threads on layouts lul…
Layouts should be used as a lot of threads you see are badly laid out i.e. mines (but not as bad as a lot of the ones I see these days).[/quote]

It used to have 3 layouts. However, I hated them all and deleted them and created this layout.

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Mattjredd95, post:23, topic:425802”]We Start at (When I get the development team together)!

Base(s): Build a base from scratch from top to bottom!!!
Base

Well add a Logo Tomorrow.

Introduction
About us
Section 3
Section 4
The Applying Layout
Staff list
Credit/Section 7

1.0 - Introduction
Hey Moparscape i am making a remake of runescape in the year of 2009, bringing back those good old days we use to have. Making a new world for those runescape lovers that loved the old days so dont miss out being apart of the team. Also we need supporters as
well thx moparscape.

2.0 - About us
I am inspired by my friends and my self making a brighter future for my future programmer’s and web developer’s by making a runescape 2009 remake. Also that well lead up into a career for my gaming company. But more focused on the runescape 2009 remake.

3.0 - Section 3
My aim or goal is to achieve the goals that all other runescape 2009 remakes couldnt do like my development team can do. Meaning adding all the ftp and ptp all 100%.

4.0 - Section 4
The donations well be shared and divided upon me, The development team, Also 20% well go to the website host and the VPS so no lag!! Woot!!.

5.0 - Relive-RS Application (Apply Here)

Code: [Select]
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?:
How old are you?:
E-mail address?:
Skype name?:
What position do you want? (Web Developer’s, Programmer, Suggester, Tester):
How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?:
What time zone are you in?:
How long will you be on everyday?:
Why do you want to become part of this server?:
Any Suggestions?:
//Other Info Below Here\

6.0 - Staff List

Programmer’s:

0/7

Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!

Suggestors:

0/2

Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!

Testers:

0/8

Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!

Web Developer’s
0/4
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!
Apply for Relive-Rs Staff!!!

7.0 - Credits/Section 7

arham 4: For the awesome Development Team Layout thx man
Mattjredd95: Me for making this of course And the name of Relive-RS, and my logo.

Thanks moparscape come and apply to join the awesome Relive-RS development team!!![/quote]
This isn’t a development team thread -_-

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @spearo spearo
item.description:
@spearo wrote:

There is way to much going on in this thread… Don’t make tons of different layouts. It looks messy.
Let people be creative with making their threads, it can sometimes let you know who is / isn’t dedicated to a project.

– Anyway 5 was the best I guess, it was simple.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I like my layouts simple, with just the introduction centered, a list of features we have now, and a colored list of planned features based on how close you are to finishing. You should take that into consideration (ofc with some spots for pictures)
